
# glustercli.cli.nfs_ganesha


## enable
```python
enable()
```

Enable NFS Ganesha

:returns: Output of Enable command, raises
 GlusterCmdException((rc, out, err)) on error


## disable
```python
disable()
```

Disable NFS Ganesha

:returns: Output of Disable command, raises
 GlusterCmdException((rc, out, err)) on error
